entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 4 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3.
